--Rukus--

Rukus taps a few more keys on the console, then hits the engage 
button and a short countdown initiates. "Comin now Krhinos."

He jogs lightly down the corridors, and soon finds himself in the 
transportation room. "Ready to go in... 5, 4, 3, 2, 1....."

The energy link engages, and the bots are shot down to the planet. A 
magnificent blue pillar of light bathes the planet, not at all a 
subtle entrance to say the least.

=)

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: The energy link is a blue pillar of light in the sky. It
> shouldn't be missed.
> 
> Krhinos: Both links are engaged? Good then. I'm going planetside 
and
> I'll start the dig in a few moment. Rukus, implement the processing
> command and join us when you're done. Gentlemen, it's time to earn
> your pay!
>
